leave_policy: Employees are entitled to 20 paid leaves per year. Unused leaves cannot be carried forward.
attendance_policy: Employees must clock in between 9 AM and 10 AM. Late arrivals beyond 10 minutes will be marked as late.
work_from_home_policy: Work from home is allowed for a maximum of 2 days per week, subject to manager approval.
maternity_policy: Female employees are entitled to 26 weeks of paid maternity leave.
overtime_policy: Overtime is compensated at 1.5x the regular hourly rate for extra hours worked beyond standard duty hours.
